name: Polar Opposites
description:
A game about two magnetic brothers who literally cannot help but mimic each other

Programming by sparky (sparky773.itch.io) and me.
Art by Mary Jane Ibarra (www.artstation.com/strongertea)
Music and sfx by Amadeus Herrera (amadeusherrera.itch.io)

Lots of mistakes lol, but I guess it is our first time trying to do a game in 48 hours
